description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes;

Effect The wyrm splatters ink in a @Template[type:cone|distance:10]. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.master.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save with a DC equal to its master's spell DC or class DC, whichever is higher.

Critical Success The creture is unaffected.

Success If the creature was invisible, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{concealed} instead for 2 rounds.

Failure As success, but for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but for 10 minutes. The creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{blinded} for 1 round or until it wipes the ink from its eyes using an Interact action
